      • getOpenMrsLocationHierarchy

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOpenMrsLocationHierarchy(java.lang.String locationId,
                                                                    boolean onlyAllowedLevels)
        This method returns the name hierarchy of a location given it's id
        Parameters:
        locationId - The ID for the location we want the hierarchy for
        onlyAllowedLevels - Restrict the location name hierarchy to only the allowed levels
        Returns:
        The name hierarchy (starting with the top-most parent) for the location or NULL if location id is not found
